title: Well my game is over
body:
Got booted from the server with 7k ping, I tried re-logging only to get the loading screen to perpetually taunt me

after waiting some time I get this http://imgur.com/a/UqZ9M

My internet is fine I think this is a server issue

replies.body: This happened to me too. Every time I tried to get back in, this message popped up afterwards.
